solution_line_template: Mr. Williams bought {gallons_bought} x {cups_per_gallon} = <<{gallons_bought}*{cups_per_gallon}={total_cups_bought}>>{total_cups_bought} cups of juice.
Since {cups_left} cups were left, then {total_cups_bought} - {cups_left} = <<{total_cups_bought}-{cups_left}={cups_drunk}>>{cups_drunk} cups were drunk.
